title: so... i got hacked
body: Hi fellow summoners, i would really like to ask if there is a way that someone can tell me that riot they have got my tickets, i have been waiting for feedback for about a week and i just want to know if riot at least has it in their inbox, i just want inner peace (this is an account that i have wasted a ton of money on, hope you will understand) your sensirely Lexient (danishtrickster){{champion:105}}

replies.body:
Hey there!

If you just want to know the status of your ticket, you can log into our support site and click on "My Tickets" at the top of the page. I went ahead and checked on your tickets though and it looks like we sent a password reset to your e-mail last week.  If you're not seeing the e-mail, be sure to check your spam folder, but let me know if you still don't see it.

im really happy for your response, but there is nothing in either my inbox or my spam folder, is there a possibility that you can change the mail cus i have the feeling that you guys are sending it to the wrong mail

We can do that for sure! We've sent it to the e-mail you used to sign up for League, but if you need to change the e-mail, head over to the support site and just update your ticket (Can check your open tickets [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests)) with the e-mail change request.

i cant do that because i sent it while i didnt have a smurf, and i couldnt log in because the guy changed my account password so i cant check on my tickets, is there a way that you can go in and make an email reset for me?
i think i found a solution, he had blocked all of your mails, thank you so much for taking the time
